title: "The Clarkson House" western font
content: Please identify this font for me. Thank You. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142606im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25549.jpg)
author: schebellm

comments.content:
In the Dover Solotype catalog there are a few candidates, but who knows if they are digitized -- 'Barnum Square" & "Old Town" (p.25). On the previous page there is one called "Warlord" and another called "Wigwam" that also have similar characteristics. The obvious digital fonts I know, like P.T. Barnum, Wanted and Playbill are not the same.   
   
What is the source of the image? Does it possibly come from before the 1990's?
